name: Recycle it!
description:
In "Recycle it!", you embark on an exhilarating journey as a bold bottle with an insatiable curiosity, daring to explore the vast expanse of the house while its inhabitants are absent. But you're not alone in your escapade – a rival bottle also seeks to traverse the same treacherous terrain.

Your mission is clear: outpace your competitor and reach the designated destination within each room, all while navigating a precarious landscape filled with potential hazards. The stakes are high – a single misstep could result in shattering defeat, leaving you at the mercy of the discerning homeowners.

But it's not just speed that matters; stealth is equally crucial. Every clink, clatter, or clang could betray your presence and alert the vigilant owners to your unauthorized antics. Your survival depends on maintaining the delicate balance between velocity and discretion.

With the ability to personalize your identity through the selection of a unique nickname, you'll immerse yourself fully in the clandestine competition. Traverse through diverse environments, from the bustling kitchen to the cozy confines of the bedroom, each presenting its own set of challenges and obstacles.

Can you navigate this perilous race to victory, evading capture and ensuring your bottle companion's safety along the way? Or will you fall victim to the unforgiving scrutiny of those who dwell within the house? The answer lies in your hands as you embark on the thrilling adventure of "Recycle it!"
